help.general: Dfps will automatically reload this config file after modification.
help.basic.def: <keyword> : <actual framerate>. If the value of keyword in [20, +inf), use 'PEAK_REFRESH_RATE 'path. If the value of keyword in [0, 20), use 'surfaceflinger backdoor' method.
help.basic.slackMs: Enter active state when touching the screen. Enter idle state <slackMs> ms after releasing screen.
help.rule: Per-app dynamic screen refresh rate rule. Default rule(packageName=default) must be specified. Offscreen rule(packageName=offsceen) is recommended to set dfps off(value=-1).
